name: Artemis Uprising
description:
Artemis Uprising is a 20-30 minute long visual novel that, fleshes out the characters and world presented in an original story synopsis that's heavily inspired by Horizon Zero Dawn.

Follow the adventures of Artemis and her childhood friend Lunette as they navigate a world gripped by fear and control from an omnipresent AI system. What path will you choose? Fight or side with the AI.... or maybe something else?

It was done for a Transmedia Project for CIU210 at SAE Institute Perth and was a collaborative effort between myself, Tara (Design Student), Gizela/Gia/Andrew(Film Students).

You can view our google drive folder here.

You can also leave Feedback here. 

It was made in Ren'py.

Thanks for checking this game out and I hope you enjoy it! 

Phu Nguyen
